com.versionone.util

Class Delegator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.versionone.util.Delegator

  • public class Delegator
extends Object
    Delegator class from the article http://www.onjava.com/pub/a/onjava/2003/05/21/delegates.html?page=1

    Class representing a delegate template - also a factory returning the real delegate object

    Author:
    Steve Lewis smlewis@lordjoe.com

      static class  Delegator.DelegateInvokeException
      All problems become this type of exception As a runtime we do not impose burdens on the calling code
